Function areas¶

The Launchpad is subdivided into three function areas by default: PROJECTS, DOCUMENTS and PARTS. These function areas are described below in detail.

Note

Each of these three function areas is available in your system environment only if the corresponding application module (CONTACT Projects, CONTACT Documents resp. CONTACT Virtual Product) is installed and licensed.

PROJECTS¶

My Project¶

Opens a hit list in a new tab with the projects for which you are a member. You can limit the hit lists further. To do so, right-click the tab and select the command Repeat search.

Find projects¶

Opens the search dialog for the Projects object type.

New project¶

Opens the dialog for creating a project.

DOCUMENTS¶

My documents¶

Opens a hit list in a new tab with the documents that you have created. You can limit the hit lists further. To do so, right-click the tab and select the command Repeat search.

My CAD documents¶

Opens a hit list in a new tab with the CAD documents that you have created. You can limit the hit lists further. To do so, right-click the tab and select the command Repeat search.

Find documents¶

Opens the search dialog for the Documents object type.

Find CAD documents¶

Opens the search dialog for the Documents object type.

New document¶

Opens the dialog for creating a document.

PART MASTER¶

My parts¶

Opens a hit list in a new tab with the parts that you have created. You can limit the hit lists further. To do so, right-click the tab and select the command Repeat search.

My parts in state Review¶

Opens a hit list in a new tab with the parts that you have created and have the state Review. You can limit the hit lists further. To do so, right-click the tab and select the command Repeat search.

Find parts¶

Opens the search dialog for the Parts object type.

New part¶

Opens the dialog for creating a part.
